price: 89. « Votre prière est exaucée, dit (Allah). Agissez avec droiture et ne suivez point le chemin de ceux qui ne savent pas. »[224]
arabic: قَالَ قَدۡ أُجِيبَت دَّعۡوَتُكُمَا فَٱسۡتَقِيمَا وَلَا تَتَّبِعَآنِّ سَبِيلَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: [224] Allah s’adresse ici à Moïse et son frère Aaron.

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla qad ujībat daʿwatukumā fa-is'taqīmā walā tattabiʿānni sabīla alladhīna lā yaʿlamūna
translations: So you two (keep to the) straight way
